Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-2LTb (XXU; 1S=S, UCSS1a; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: the broad-folded frog,Hylarana latouchii, China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Activity: Active against S. aureus ATCC2592 (MIC 3.8 uM), B. licheniformis X39 (IS) (MIC 3.8 uM), S. carnosus KHS (IS) (MIC 1.9 uM), R. rhodochrous X15 (IS) (MIC 1.9 uM), E. coli ATCC 25922 (MIC 30 uM), S. rubidaea X01 (IS) (MIC 60 uM), P. aeruginosa 1.50 (IS) (MIC 30 uM), and P. faecalis X29 (IS) (MIC 1.9 uM).Toxicity: Hemolytic HC50 480 uM. Updated 10/2020
Literature Information.Author: Wang H, Yu Z, Hu Y, Yu H, Ran R, Xia J, Wang D, Yang S, Yang X, Liu J.2012
Literature Information.Title: Molecular cloning and characterization of antimicrobial peptides from skin of the broad-folded frog, Hylarana latouchii.
